name: Grilled Cheese and Veggie Sandwich
author: COURTNEYSUNSHINE
summary: This is a delicious twist on the old grilled cheese standby! The recipe is very easy and tasty.
ingredients: 8 thick slices (3/4 inch thick) sourdough bread
directions: In a medium bowl, toss together the coleslaw mix and bean sprouts
Spread one side of each bread slice with margarine
Spread opposite side of 4 slices with honey mustard
Layer the honey mustard side of the 4 bread slices with the coleslaw mixture and cheese
Top with remaining 4 bread slices, margarine side out
In a large skillet over medium heat, cook the sandwiches about 2 minutes on each side, until the cheese has melted and the bread is golden brown
